meta.title: Aurel Kolani — FullStack Developer TypeScript & Node.js | Dakar
meta.description: Portfolio of Aurel Kolani, Backend-oriented FullStack Developer based in Dakar. Expert in TypeScript, Node.js, Express, React, Next.js, Laravel, MongoDB, PostgreSQL. Building high-performance web applications end-to-end.

meta.ogTitle: Aurel Kolani — FullStack Backend Developer TypeScript
meta.ogDescription: Expert in TypeScript, Node.js, React & Laravel based in Dakar. I design and build high-performance web applications from concept to deployment.

hero.name: Aurel Kolani
hero.description: Backend-oriented — TypeScript, Node.js/Express, PHP/Laravel, React.js, React Native

about.title: About
about.p1: Passionate FullStack Developer based in Dakar, Senegal. I design and build high-performance web and mobile applications, from concept to deployment.
about.p2: Currently pursuing a Master's in Information Systems Management & Security at Groupe ISM Dakar, I combine a solid software engineering background with hands-on experience on real-world projects.
about.p3: My approach: clean code, thoughtful architecture, and a keen focus on user experience. I love building MVPs end-to-end and solving complex problems.

items.description: Frontend development with React.js and TypeScript. Backend development with Laravel, Node.js, and Express.
Frontend development with React.js, backend with Node.js/Express, API integration, and SEO optimization.
API development with Laravel, Swagger documentation, MySQL database management.
